price: Baranafise n’ibindi bibafitiye akamaro bikomoka kuri nya bitungwa; nk’ubwoya n’insato, n’ibindi, hamwe rero n’amata banywa. Mbega abantu ntiboshimira Imana Allah ku nema zayo, bagaheza bakayisenga ari Imwe Rudende!
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
